tool_description: Optimizes individual order sizes to minimize market impact while meeting portfolio targets.

total_order_size.description: Total size of order to optimize

error_messages: Invalid order size: total_order_size must be positive.
Invalid volume: avg_daily_volume must be positive.
Invalid volatility: volatility must be non-negative.
Invalid timeframe: execution_timeframe must be positive.
Invalid participation rate: max_participation_rate must be between 0 and 1.
usage: Provide total_order_size, avg_daily_volume, volatility, and execution_timeframe. Adjust max_participation_rate to control market impact.

time_intervals.description: Time intervals between orders in minutes
